title: YMDUCH Women's Elegant Sleeveless Off Shoulder Bodycon Long Formal Party Evening Dress
description: Fabric: Polyester and Spandex fabric, the fabric is soft and stretchy and comfortable to wear.

Unique design: sleeveless, off-shoulder design, you can also choose not to strap on as needed, V-shaped backless design on the back,the skirt of the long evening dress is a mermaid design, the skirt The length allows you to wear high heels and mop the floor. It can make you more elegant and dignified.

Suitable Occasion: Evening dresses, cocktail parties, parties, clubs, graduations, important business meetings, weddings, bridesmaid dresses, birthday parties, portraits and other important formal occasions can be worn.
Wear with: A dignified and elegant long dress. Wear it with accessories such as a clutch, high heels and necklaces.

There are five different sizes for you to choose from: S=(US4-6), M=(US8-10)，L=(US12-14)，XL=(US16-18),XXL=(US 20),the dress is stretchy,for more sizing details please refer to the product description;please check it before you buy!
